segments.text: Excuse me . I'm looking for an old music box .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Something made in the ' 20s would be nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We had seven , but we sold one this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are dancing figures a part of any of the boxes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're in luck . Two of them have dancing figures .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , these are great . I think I'll take this one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that one is very nice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now , does this come with a warranty ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , but you just have to take your chances .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Even if it doesn't work , it's a beautiful collectible .
segments.speaker: S2
